import React, { useState } from 'react' const CreateCompany = () => { const [company, setCompany] = useState( { companyName: null, owner: null, pin: null, headquarter: null, }) const onChange = (e) => { setCompany({ ...company, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const onSubmit = (e) => { } console.log(company) return (

Create Company

) } export default CreateCompany
